      • registerPrompt

        @PostMapping(value="/Register")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView registerPrompt(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="registerUser")
                                                                                                    @Valid UserContainer user,
                                                                                                    org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="cpw")
                                                                                                    String cpw)
        Maps the URL with /Register and processes the data submitted in the form inside register view
        Parameters:
        UserContainer - model for retrieving data from form with spring form tag library and checks if it is valid with hibernate validation
        Binding - result takes in result taken from validation under model used
        Retrieves - singular field to validate password
        Returns:
        Model and view to pass models and display it inside the view
